settings.section_title: Begin Your Search For The Ideal Wedding Dresses
settings.text:
Welcome to the store of New York bridal designer Tony Hamawy. We create luxury custom bridal wedding gowns and evening gowns with a focus on fine fabrics, European couture details, impeccable quality, and personalised service. Our styles are modern, luxury, and feminine; our clients are confident, cultured, and appreciate classic beauty. We lean toward eco-conscious production. While all of our gowns are available in the finest silk fabrics, imported French lace, and modern crystal beading, we offer alternative fabrics for our budget-minded customers as well.

Exceptional care in every detail

Tony Hamawy‚Äôs studio is located in the heart of Brooklyn, New York, where all custom wedding gowns are created according to your measurements and specifications. We offer private consultations to our customers for wedding dresses in New York city; please contact us if you would like to schedule an appointment. If you‚Äôre unable to travel to Brooklyn, simply contact us via email for more information on creating a custom wedding gown. This process will include detailed communication and off-site fittings in lieu of studio visits.

No matter where you are, we look forward to serving you. From concept to final fitting, we offer personalized service and communication to perfect the gown of your choice.

settings.bottom_content:
EMAIL A PRESONAL SHOPPER
For styling, help with sizing & suggestions.

settings.related_title: IF YOU LIKE OPEN BACKS, YOU MAY ALSO LIKE:

settings.title: Tony Hamawy Studio
settings.text: Is this your time to shine? Brides-to-be in the New York City area are invited to our private bridal gown studio in Brooklyn for a personal consultation with designer Tony Hamawy. Our warm and welcoming location in the historic borough of Brooklyn sets a perfect stage for the gown of your dreams, with great light, comfortable space for seating and bridal fittings in Brooklyn, and a wide selection of inspiring couture bridal gowns. Since studio visits are scheduled by appointment only, we encourage you to contact us early in the process of planning the exciting and memorable day ahead of you.

When you schedule a visit to Tony Hamawy‚Äôs bridal gown studio in Brooklyn, you‚Äôre treated to a celebrity-level experience perfectly fitting to the bride-to-be. With couture expertise spanning continents and decades, Hamawy‚Äîan acclaimed wedding dress designer in Brooklyn‚Äîcreates and constructs your gown with perfection through traditional, time-honored dressmaking techniques.

Just bring your ideas and inspiration, wedding-day or similar shoes, and a trusted companion or two. We‚Äôll begin your custom bridal consultation to create a gown that looks‚Äîand fits‚Äîjust like your dreams. At Tony Hamawy‚Äôs bridal gown studio, your fantasy fits on a hanger.

üëâ Book your appointment today to design the dress of your dreams.

settings.content:
CUSTOM WEDDING GOWN

I will work directly with you to design and create the ideal custom wedding gown you envision, with your favorite elements of our own designs, vintage styles, and your individual desires and inspiration photos. (Please note that we will not copy complete designs from other sources or designers.)

This custom design service includes a minimum of five (5) sketches. We will produce as many sketches needed (within reason) to find the affordable wedding dresses for you, and you‚Äôll receive a muslin* of your dress for try-on before the final product is created. will personally assist with your fitting via a Skype conversation, and guide you through the pinning process. If you are near the New York city area, we can schedule your fittings at our Brooklyn studio.

Please allow 20 weeks from payment to shipping date for delivery of custom wedding gown . Prices begin at $2,500. RUSH service is available for custom gowns. ¬†Please contact us for more details.

*A muslin is a copy of a garment, made of inexpensive cotton fabric, that is used to test the fit before the final pieces of fabric are cut.

Photos, Please!
We‚Äôd Love to Celebrate Your Important Day

We admit it‚Äîwe‚Äôre suckers for weddings. Even after your Tony Hamawy gownsits perfect and gorgeous on a hanger, we know it will only be truly stunning when you‚Äôre in it. While we can‚Äôt ask you to make room on the guest list, we hope you‚Äôll allow us to celebrate your big day by sharing photos of all the fun, your fantastic dress, and the beauty of a uniquely lovely ‚Äúyou‚Äù anticipating the happiest of futures!

settings.title: How do I book an appointment?
settings.text: You can request an appointment at our Brooklyn Studio by visiting www.tonyhamawy.com or by emailing us at: info@tonyhamawy.com

settings.title: What is the price range of your gowns?
settings.text: Our Bridal Collection ranges from $2,200-$5,500 and up.¬† We also offer custom gowns services, price upon request.

settings.title: Do you make custom wedding gowns?
settings.text: We do, we will work directly with you to design and create the ideal dress you envision,¬†Prices begin at $3,500. Rush service is available for custom wedding gowns.¬† Please contact us for more details.

settings.title: What does "Made-To-Order" mean?
settings.text: Made-to-order means that each gown is produced specifically for that bride.¬† We don‚Äôt start making the dress until the bride has placed her order.

settings.title: How many guests am I allowed to bring to my appointment?
settings.text: We suggest that our brides bring 1-3 guests with them while viewing and selecting a gown. We‚Äôre always happy to accommodate more guests, but suggest fewer guests for a smoother process.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.text: Discover answers to common questions about custom wedding gowns at Tonyhamawy.com where you'll find expert advice and detailed information on creating your dream gown. Visit our FAQ section for more information.

settings.quote: Tony designed my daughters weeding gown from start to finish it was a wonderful experience. The dress is absolutely stunning. She said it was far better then she had even imagined. Highly recommended !!
settings.author: Laura

settings.quote: from start to finish, Tony Hamawy gave me an extraordinary experience in my journey as a bride, capturing the vision for my dream wedding dress and developing it into a remarkeble coutom couture silk wedding gown beyond my dream!!
settings.author: Hannah

settings.quote: After getting engaged, and some research, a good friend of mine recommended Tony. Tony was very responsive, flexible and professional throughout the entire process. I highly recommended Tony and would work with him in the future.
settings.author: Latoya

settings.quote: I can't say enough things about the wedding dress i bought from Tony. I had been searching for a wedding dress 3 months trying all sorts of bridal shops on the west coast, NYC, CHicago, and online and hadn't found anything that felt like "me". I wanted something simple yet classic and felt unique at the same time.
settings.author: Terin

settings.quote: Tony was so great and so professional. We facetimes so that he could show me his studio, his process, and even the dress along the way. He sent me samples to try on all the way to New Orleans and then i decided which dress i liked and he made me it in ivory. SO it was custom dress and was such a fun process working with Tony.
settings.author: Jen

settings.quote: Tony was super responsive through email & text. While he gave his own input, he was also incredibly patient and receptive to my feedback and would always check to see if i was happy before moving forward. I'm so glad i went to Tony for Custom Wedding Gown.
settings.author: Connie
